description: Provides a list of custom vocabulary filters that match the specified criteria. If no criteria are specified, all custom vocabularies are returned. To get detailed information about a specific custom vocabulary filter, use the operation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is present in your response, it indicates that not all results are displayed. To view the next set of results, copy the string associated with the NextToken parameter in your results output, then run your request again including NextToken with the value of the copied string. Repeat as needed to view all your results.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilters
nested_items.description: Provides information about the custom vocabulary filters that match the criteria specified in your request.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterName
nested_items.description: A unique name, chosen by you, for your custom vocabulary filter. This name is case sensitive, cannot contain spaces, and must be unique within an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code that represents the language of the entries in your vocabulary filter. Each custom vocabulary filter must contain terms in only one language.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the specified custom vocabulary filter was last modified.
